name: Rakesh Patel
text: Hansika has been an incredible support through a difficult time in my life. Her guidance and understanding helped me manage my anxiety and regain confidence. I truly feel stronger and more balanced now.

name: Meet Patel
text: My partner and I attended couples therapy with Hansika, and it completely transformed our relationship. She helped us communicate better and reconnect in ways we never thought possible.

name: Priya Sharma
text: Working with Hansika has been life-changing. She creates a safe and compassionate space where I feel heard and supported. Iâ€™ve learned to cope with stress and approach life with a clearer mindset.
